name: ICUBE (miventech)
description:
It is a game based on the Foddian theme, for "Ludwig Jam".

The game is very simple to play, you only have to use the keys of the cross or the "W, A, S, D" to pass through a number of challenges and reach the end, and show how much skill you have with challenges such as this.

Will you be able to complete it to the end?
